Method Detail

findToken

@java.lang.Override
java.lang.String findToken(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Finds the bearer token within the specified request. It will attempt to look in all places allowed by the specification: Authorization header, form encoded body, and query string.
Parameters:
request
Returns:
the token if found, null otherwise

isFormEncoded

private boolean isFormEncoded(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest servletRequest)
